modmenu.descriptionTranslation.anchormac: AnchorMacro — a customizable automation and combat utility mod.
anchormacro.title: AnchorMacro
anchormacro.config.title: AnchorMacro Configuration
anchormacro.config.auto_search: Auto Search for Anchor, Glowstone, and Totem
anchormacro.module.autototem.desc: Automatically replaces empty offhand or mainhand slot with a Totem of Undying when popped.
anchormacro.module.totemhit.desc: Allows the player to deal normal knockback when attacking with a Totem of Undying.
anchormacro.module.hitbox.desc: Expands hitboxes of nearby entities (players and mobs) for easier targeting.
anchormacro.module.anchormacro.desc: Automates the placement and charging of respawn anchors for PvP use.
anchormacro.status.test_success: AnchorMacro Test Successful – Mod is Working!
